Package com.im.njams.sdk.common

Class JsonSerializerFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.im.njams.sdk.common.JsonSerializerFactory
  • public class JsonSerializerFactory
extends Object
    Provides factory methods for JSON serializers and mappers.
    Author:
    cwinkler

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      protected static String MIX_IN_FILTER_ID
      ID for the filter used by the mix-in interface.

    • Field Detail

      • MIX_IN_FILTER_ID

        protected static final String MIX_IN_FILTER_ID
        ID for the filter used by the mix-in interface.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • getFastMapper

        public static com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ObjectMapper getFastMapper()
        Returns a cached default mapper with configuration that is required for all created serializers. This instance is cached and optimized for performance instead of readability, e.g., it does not apply pretty-printing as the mapper provided by getDefaultMapper().
        Returns:
        the ObjectMapper.

      • getDefaultMapper

        public static com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ObjectMapper getDefaultMapper()
        Returns a cached default mapper with configuration that is required for all created serializers. skipNullValues and pretty will be set to true.
        Returns:
        the ObjectMapper.

      • getDefaultMapper

        public static com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ObjectMapper getDefaultMapper​(com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonFactory factory)
        Allows to create a mapper with a different JsonFactory that uses the same settings as the default JSON mappers used by this application.
        Parameters:
        factory - May be null to use the default JSON factors.
        Returns:
        the default ObjectMapper

      • addSerializer

        public static <T> void addSerializer​(com.faizsiegeln.njams.messageformat.v4.converter.Converter<T> converter,
                                     boolean replace)
        Registers a pair of serializer/deserialzer derived from the given message-format Converter instance.
        Type Parameters:
        T - Object type for which the serializers should be added
        Parameters:
        converter - The Converter implementation used for serializing and deserializing.
        replace - If true any registered serializer for the same type is replaced. Otherwise, if a serializer for the same type is already registered, this method does nothing. Be careful with overwriting default serializers!

      • addLocalDateTimeSerializer

        @Deprecated(forRemoval=true,
            since="5.0.0")
public static void addLocalDateTimeSerializer()
        Deprecated, for removal: This API element is subject to removal in a future version.
        A serializer for LocalDateTime is registered by default.
        Registers a (de-/)serializer definition for serializing (parsing) LocalDateTime as/from Strings.

      • addSerializer

        public static <T> void addSerializer​(com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonSerializer<T> serializer,
                                     com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonDeserializer<T> deserializer)
        Registers a custom serializer for a specific object type to the mappers generated with this utility. Does nothing, if a serializer for the same type is already registered.
        Type Parameters:
        T - Object type for which the serializers should be added
        Parameters:
        serializer - custom serializer
        deserializer - custom deserializer

      • addSerializer

        public static <T> void addSerializer​(com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonSerializer<T> serializer,
                                     com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonDeserializer<T> deserializer,
                                     boolean replace)
        Registers a custom serializer for a specific object type to the mappers generated with this utility.
        Type Parameters:
        T - Object type for which the serializers should be added
        Parameters:
        serializer - custom serializer
        deserializer - custom deserializer
        replace - If true any registered serializer for the same type is replaced. Otherwise, if a serializer for the same type is already registered, this method does nothing. Be careful with overwriting default serializers!

      • hasSerializer

        public static boolean hasSerializer​(Class<?> type)
        Returns whether or not a custom serializer is currently registered for the given type. Note that default converters are lazily added when needed, i.e., for such types, this method may wrongly return false because the according serializer is not yet created, but it will, when needed.
        Parameters:
        type - The type to check.
        Returns:
        true if a serializer is registered for the given type.

      • removeSerializer

        public static boolean removeSerializer​(Class<?> type)
        Removes any custom serializer mapping for the given type. Required default serializers are automatically re-added, i.e., for such types, this method behaves like reset-to-default.
        Parameters:
        type - The type for that the custom serializer shall be removed.
        Returns:
        true only if there was a serializer registered for the given type.

      • getMapper

        public static com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ObjectMapper getMapper​(boolean skipNullValues,
                                                                    boolean pretty)
        Creates a customized wrapper with some special settings.
        Parameters:
        skipNullValues - if true all null values will not be serialized.
        pretty - if true the result JSON will be prettyfied.
        Returns:
        the ObjectMapper with the selected settings.

      • createDefaultWriter

        public static com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ObjectWriter createDefaultWriter()
        Returns a default writer instance. This is essentially the same as invoking createWriter(boolean, boolean) with both parameters set to false.
        Returns:
        the DefaultWriter

      • createWriter

        public static com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ObjectWriter createWriter​(boolean skipNullValues,
                                                                       boolean pretty)
        Returns a Json writer configured according to the given settings.
        Parameters:
        skipNullValues - If set to true, properties that have a null value are not serialized.
        pretty - If set to to true, the writer will format the Json output.
        Returns:
        the ObjectWriter

      • propertiesToJsonString

        public static String propertiesToJsonString​(Properties properties)
        Coverts Properties to json
        Parameters:
        properties - to convert
        Returns:
        json string representation for the given properties
